Campus Safety

Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
There is always a cop or security guard around, my safety has never felt in jeopardy.
There is a club for everything and everyone is inviting. Every club and activity help invites students of every majors to participate.
If the economy hit you like it did for most people, Southern is at a great price and your education quality doesn't have to suffer.

Southern has a unique and warming library dedicated to Chemistry majors and its comforting to know students before you and students after you have and will spend as many hours in that library stressing over your classes like you are. Most of the Chemistry majors have made this room their second home and everyone comes together in this room to help anyone when needed.
Tuition is at a decent amount and it is definitely worth your money.
Southern is located just walking distances of great places to eat and great bars and clubs for those who like to hang out and enjoy a drink.
Food is great at Southern and there is food available in every building and the prices are decent

Dorm rooms are welcoming and clean and give you a home feeling. Every dorm building is in walking distance to every campus building. There is always someone in residence life available to help with any issue and safety is a priority and you can see that.

Southern challenges its students academic as well as set goals/expectations for all students to meet and maintain. Though challenging, the professors at Southern are always there to help and guide students when needed.
Plan out what courses you need to take and when you want to graduate. Set goals for yourself so you don't fall behind and are left out of courses you need to help you move toward graduation.

Southern is a school with alot of opportunities. A school with caring and enthusiastic professors who are there to help you at any moment. Southern welcomes everyone with open arms and willing to help you succeed.

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I live on campus and love it so much! Southern is a perfect match for me and I could never imagine going anywhere else. Am learning a lot I've learned more in a year and a half here at Southern than I did all throughout high school. If you choose the right professors learning is fun as well!
